description: This file defines a utility class 'ApiRequestContextHolder' that manages thread-local instances of 'ApiRequestContext' for handling request-specific data within the application.

classes.name: ApiRequestContextHolder
classes.description: A utility class providing thread-local storage and retrieval methods for ApiRequestContext objects, ensuring request-specific data isolation in multithreaded environments.

methods.name: clearContext
methods.description: Removes the current ApiRequestContext instance from the thread-local storage.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Retrieves the current ApiRequestContext from thread-local storage; if none exists, creates a new instance, stores it, and returns it.
